wikipedia_page.main: General Rowland Hill, 1st Viscount Hill,  (11 August 1772 – 10 December 1842) was a British Army officer who served in the Napoleonic Wars as a brigade, division and corps commander. He became Commander-in-Chief of the British Army in 1828.

response: * Rowland Hill, 1st Viscount Hill, Napoleonic era general
